Description: Fragment of papyrus bearing 3 lines of a Coptic text written along the fibres (recto), and 3 lines against the fibres (verso). EA75355, 75354, 75353, 75352, 75351, 75350, 75349, 75348, 75347, 75346, 75345, 75344, 75343, 75342 are mounted together.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380748) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380748)
